page.title: 14INTERESTS AND HOBBIES
page.content: Not that much happens in Hereford because it is very small compared to London and other big cities.We have only one professional football club, who are in the fourth division,at the moment. One of the main interests of the young are the{Pop groups.}We like Duran Duran,Wham,Nik Kershaw,Howard Jones and Madonna. Hereford has{sports}facilities for a large number of activities.Some of the most popular are football,cricket, rounders,swimming,archery,tennis, squash,badminton,dancing and judo. Other{pastimes}include watching television and going to discos. One advantage Hereford has is beautiful{countryside}and walking, climbing,fishing and canoeing are popular.Hereford is not large enough to stage major events.
